metadata.synopsis: After fighting off the Dark Justiciar attack on Balthazar's hideout in the Shar Temple, the players are invited to his personal quarters to speak properly
metadata.how_to_trigger: Triggered automatically after the player defeats the Dark Justiciars, if Balthazar was pulled into the previous combat against the Dark Justiciars

1.speaker: Balthazar
1.text: Forced to fight using my own flesh? How... unbecoming.
1.context: NodeContext: Peeved. He was forced to get his hands dirty in a fight due to the player shifting the course of battle in his direction.

0.speaker: Balthazar
0.text: Join me in my chambers. I would speak to you, before your blundering causes any more calamities.
